product_name: Acorn Bromley Bootie Slippers - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The women's Acorn Bromley Bootie slippers are perfect for weekend mornings, after-work foot relief and any other time you feel the need to slip your feet into incredible comfort. Wool knit uppers with sueded leather sidewalls offer natural water- and odor-resistance. Microfleece linings provide warmth, cushioning and moisture management to keep bare or socked feet dry and comfortable. Lightweight, shock-absorbent EVA midsoles cushion every step. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles offer ample traction for indoor use. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Acorn Bromley Bootie slippers are perfect for weekend mornings, after-work foot relief and any other time you feel the need to slip your feet into incredible comfort.
